card.name: A Planet Far, Far Away

card.text: Galactic Detonation deals 2 damage to any target. Augmented — If you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, Galactic Detonation deals 5 damage instead.

card.text: Converge — Admin of Asthenia enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it. Admin of Asthenia can't attack unless its power is 4 or greater.

card.text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Ancient Artillery
card.text: {3}, {T}: Ancient Artillery deals 1 damage to target creature or planeswalker and 1 damage to that permanent's controller.

card.name: Essential Override
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. Choose two — • Untap each artifact you control. • Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature you control. • Draw a card.

card.name: End of the World
card.text: Destroy all nonenchantment permanents. If thirty or more lands were destroyed this way, you win the game.

card.name: The Tomb of Precursors
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Novaheart Guardian
card.text: Flying When Novaheart Guardian enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to any target. Whenever a creature or planeswalker dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Novaheart Guardian.

card.name: Pernicious Primavore
card.text: Trample When Pernicious Primavore enters the battlefield or dies, destroy up to three target artifacts and/or enchantments.

card.name: Dirty-Pawed Grazer
card.text: Converge — Dirty-Pawed Grazer enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it. Dirty-Pawed Grazer can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Rule the World
card.text: You have hexproof. Creatures you don't control have base power and toughness 1/1 and lose all abilities. Nonbasic lands you don't control don't untap during their controller's untap step.

card.name: Unending Armies
card.text: Create three 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens. Exile Unending Armies. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have more life than each opponent, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

card.name: Armoured Guardian
card.text: Haste Augmented — Whenever you cast a spell, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Armoured Guardian. It loses this ability and gains "Whenever this attacks, it deals 2 damage to each of up to two targets."

card.name: Enlightened Guardian
card.text: Flying Augmented — Whenever you cast a spell, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Enlightened Guardian. It loses this ability and gains "Whenever this creature attacks, draw two cards."

card.name: Isolated Guardian
card.text: Trample Augmented — Whenever you cast a spell, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Isolated Guardian. It loses this ability and gains "Whenever this attacks, put two +1/+1 counters on each of up to two target creatures."

card.name: Jaded Guardian
card.text: Menace Augmented — Whenever you cast a spell, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Jaded Guardian. It loses this ability and gains "Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents."

card.name: United Guardian
card.text: Lifelink Augmented — Whenever you cast a spell, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on United Guardian. It loses this ability and gains "Whenever United Guardian attacks, create two 1/1 blue Elemental creature tokens with flying that are tapped and attacking."

card.name: Thorn-Touch Abomination
card.text: Flash Thorn-Touch Abomination enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Advanced Schematics
card.text: Choose one — • Create three X/X colorless Construct artifact creature tokens. • Create X tokens that are copies of target artifact you control.

card.name: Slyten Crystal Motherlode
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Slyten Crystal Motherlode: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}.

card.name: Reenter Orbit
card.text: Converge — Exile up to X nonland permanents you control, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast Reenter Orbit, then return them to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Sword of Monsters and Men
Crucible of Worlds
card.text: You may play lands from your graveyard.

card.name: I'll Be Gone
card.text: Exile all creature cards from target player's graveyard. For each creature card exiled this way, search that player's library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

card.name: Burning Up
card.text: You may cast this spell as though it had flash if it targets a creature or planeswalker. Burning Up deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

card.name: Starborne Hellkite
card.text: Flying Whenever Starborne Hellkite attacks, choose two— • Starborne Hellkite deals 4 damage to any target. • Destroy target artifact or land. • Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Between Life and Death
card.text: Return up to two target creature cards with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. They can't block this turn.

card.name: Chromatic Herald
card.text: Flying Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color." As long as you control seven or more lands, creatures you control have trample, haste, and hexproof.

card.name: FO-2 Radiation Kid
card.text: Trample Noncreature spells cost an additional "Put a noncreature permanent you both own and control on top of your library" to cast.

card.name: The Oltenen Emissary
card.text: The Oltenen Emissary is all colors. You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay the mana cost for spells that you cast. When you do, you may cast spells without paying their mana costs until end of turn.

card.name: Watch the World Fade
card.text: {4}{B}{R}: Exile Watch the World Fade from your hand with seven apocalypse counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Watch the World Fade is exiled, remove an apocalypse counter from it. If you do, each opponent loses 3 life unless they discard a card or sacrifice a nonland permanent. When you remove the last counter this way, each player loses the game.

card.name: Combat Technician
card.text: Whenever Combat Technician attacks, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token that's tapped and attacking. Then Combat Technician gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each artifact you control.

card.name: Jacque, Crystal-Touched
card.text: Vigilance Augmented — Whenever Jacque attacks, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, you may exile any number of target nonland permanents, then return them to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control.

card.name: Mentalist Guardian
card.text: Other Elementals you control get +2/+2. Whenever one or more Elementals you control attack, tap up to one target creature you don't control.

card.name: Field Technician
card.text: When Field Technician enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top of it. Artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Olten Survivalist
card.text: Cadence (Whenever you cast a spell, if its mana value is greater than this creature's power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Creatures with power less than Olten Survivalist's power can't block creatures you control.

card.name: Hopeless Wanderer
card.text: Cadence (Whenever you cast a spell, if its mana value is greater than this creature's power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Hopeless Wanderer can't be blocked.

card.name: Wild Dogs of the Night
card.text: Whenever Wild Dogs of the Night or another Horror enters the battlefield under your control, exile up to one target card in a graveyard. If that card was a creature card, you gain 2 life and put two +1/+1 counters on that Horror.

card.name: On the Shoulders of Giants
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with power less than it. {3}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

card.name: Biocrystal Augmentation
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures. Augmented — If you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, instead put three +1/+1 counters on each of those creatures. They gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Lay Claim to Nature
card.text: Return any number of lands you control to their owner's hands. For each land returned this way, search your library for a land card, reveal it, then put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Olten Sandwurm
card.text: Trample, haste Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, you may return Olten Sandwurm to its owner's hand.

card.name: Want It All
card.text: Augmented — When you cast Want It All, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, copy Want It All for each other spell cast this turn. Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. You may play it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Senator Christian Winters
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life. {2}{W}: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

card.name: The Flenser of Singularities
card.text: Whenever an opponent activates an ability of a nonland permanent, destroy that permanent. {3}{U}{B}{R}: Exile target creature or planeswalker card in a graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of it.

card.name: Hall of Random Access Memories
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Hall of Random Access Memories: Return target artifact, instant, or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.text: Flying Whenever Planetary Reconnoiterer attacks, target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Glowspore Swarmgrounds

card.name: Guardian of Lost Truths
card.text: When Guardian of Lost Truths enters the battlefield, if a library has twenty or fewer cards left in it, draw two cards. Otherwise, target player mills five cards.

card.name: Far Wandering Guardian

card.name: K-17 Drone

card.name: Power Drive
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. Choose two — • Creatures without flying can't block this turn. • Two target creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn. • Power Drive deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Green Daywalker
card.text: When Green Daywalker enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment. Augmented — At the beginning of each end step, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Green Daywalker.

card.name: Growing Up
card.text: Target creature +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn. Leitmotif (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. When you next cast a spell that shares a color with this card, you may cast this from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Bury the Past
card.text: Converge — Destroy up to X target artifacts or enchantments, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast Bury the Past.

card.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, mill two cards. {1}{G}, Sacrifice Strange Discovery: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Terrasculpt Mantas
card.text: Flying {T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: United Patrol

card.name: Vengeant Precursor
card.text: Haste Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Vengeant Precursor. It gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Sage of Wilds
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Sage of Wilds. Augmented — {T}: Scry 1, then draw a card. Activate only if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn.

card.name: Gateblessed Explorer
card.text: You may cast Gateblessed Explorer from your graveyard as long as you control three or more creatures. Whenever another creature dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Source Decay
card.text: Source Decay deals 2 damage to each opponent. Create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{B}{R} and sacrifice it. If you do, return Source Decay from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Atrocity of Flesh
card.text: When Atrocity of Flesh enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent. When Atrocity of Flesh dies, you may exile it. If you do, return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Collapsing Star Viper
card.text: Haste When Collapsing Star Viper enters the battlefield, you may tap target permanent with mana value X or less. At the beginning of your upkeep, return Collapsing Star Viper to its owner's hand.

card.name: AOSE Skydrone
card.text: Flying Whenever AOSE Skydrone deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Clash Reactor
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, Clash Reactor deals X damage to each opponent, where X is the number of colors of cards exiled with Clash Reactor.

card.name: Servant of Precursors
card.text: When Servant of Precursors enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life and draw a card.
